content: turn single_crochet in the 1st st 2 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet in 4 sts 2 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet in last st 10sc  row 18 22 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across  row 23 chain 1 turn single_crochet in the 1st st 2 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet in 6 sts 2 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet in last st 12sc  row 24 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across do not turn after this row  row 25 chain 5 single_crochet across the 10 sts of the front chain 5 join to 1st stitch of back this row joins the front to the back  row 26 chain 1 turn work a round of single_crochet or reverse single_crochet in each st and chain st around join fasten_off option to work a higher neckline if you would like a higher neckline as in the yellow top here is how to do that  join yarn in the 1st st of the ribbed section you will be working in the ends of the row chain 1 single_crochet in the 1st 7 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 4 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 10 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 4 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 7 sts 36 single_crochet  chain 1 turn single_crochet in the 1st 6 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 10 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet the next 2 sts together single_crochet in the next 6 sts fasten_off 32 single_crochet
